arts.ttl: Ref asks Messi for shirt after Miami's win in KC
arts.sum: Inter Miami CF captain Lionel Messi experienced an unusual request following his team's 1-0 win at Sporting Kansas City on Wednesday as the match referee asked him for his jersey.

arts.ttl: MLS 2025 predictions: Messi and Inter Miami’s outlook, top newcomers and more
arts.athr: Alexander Abnos, Jon Arnold, Joseph Lowery and Graham Ruthven
arts.sum: The 2025 MLS season kicks off this week. We convened a panel of writers to discuss what they’re most looking forward to this year Seeing more really good soccer in 2025. Over the last few years, it feels like the quality of the average coach in MLS has noticeably increased. Only a handful of MLS teams are still holding on to the “let’s play a 4-2-3-1 and defend in a mid-block” era with both hands. Pretty much every team has a distinct, observable style. JW Continue reading...

arts.ttl: Lionel Messi plays 'coldest game of his career' and defies rumours with Inter Miami supershow
arts.sum: Reports had suggested the World Cup winner wasn't keen on playing in the extreme weather conditions

arts.ttl: Mascherano: Frigid temps in Miami win 'not human'
arts.sum: Inter Miami CF coach Javier Mascherano called the freezing conditions 'inhumane' after their 1-0 win over Sporting Kansas City in the Concacaf Champions Cup first leg.

arts.ttl: Lionel Messi plays the coldest game of his career as he earns Inter Miami opening win in freezing Kansas City
arts.sum: Lionel Messi played in the coldest game of his career on Wednesday night as his Inter Miami played in absolutely frigid conditions.

arts.ttl: Messi leads Miami to win in frigid first leg of CCC
arts.sum: Inter Miami CF kicked off its 2025 campaign with a 1-0 victory over Sporting Kansas City in the first leg of the first round of the Concacaf Champions Cup at Children's Mercy Park.

arts.ttl: Preview: Inter Miami vs. New York City FC - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Sunday's Major League Soccer clash between Inter Miami and New York City FC, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.

arts.ttl: Messi's 56th minute goal gives Inter Miami 1-0 win over Sporting KC in Champions Cup
arts.sum: Lionel Messi scored from the right side of the box in the 56th minute to lift Inter Miami past Sporting Kansas City 1-0 on a bitterly cold Wednesday night in the first leg of the CONCACAF Champions Cup’s first round. Sporting KC stayed on the front foot the rest of the game in an attempt to tie the match, but Oscar Ustari stopped both of the team’s second-half shots on goal.

arts.ttl: Avram Glazer faces awkward questions about his Man United future as unpopular co-owner is cornered by reporter on the streets of Miami on his way to see Donald Trump
arts.sum: The Glazers been at the helm at Old Trafford for nearly two decades, though their popularity is at an all time low, largely as a result of the club's woeful financial situation under their stewardship.

arts.ttl: Lamine Yamal's record after 100 games compared to Lionel Messi & Cristiano Ronaldo
arts.sum: Lamine Yamal's goals and assists tally after 100 professional games holds up against Lionel Messi and Cristiano Ronaldo.
